channel.title: How do i make 2 handed weapons 2 handed? (no sheild)
channel.description:
Hey
i would like to make godswords 2 handed, like i want to be able to weild a godsword, and while weilding it i cannot equip a sheild.
ive searched everywhere and cannot find anything relating to it in my server source
please help :S
